titles.title: Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Special Management Area Designation Act
To designate the Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Sanctuary in the State of Oregon.
Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Special Management Area Designation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Special Management Area Designation Act
This bill designates approximately 99,653 acres of Forest Service land in Oregon as the "Frank Moore Wild Steelhead Special Management Area."
